description.displayText: Angelina is very fun loving caring kindhearted she is dependable and will always try her best at whatever she does. She is a wonderful person she loves kids and making them happy has never been an issue she plays with them and likes to go to the park.
description.originalText: Angelina is very fun loving caring kindhearted she is dependable and will always try her best at whatever she does. She is a wonderful person she loves kids and making them happy has never been an issue she plays with them and likes to go to the park.

description.displayText: She watched my newborn till she was about one and a half and took very good care of her. Even giving medicine and informing us when she has a cough or rashes or anything. I would definitely recommend her to watch any ages because I've also seen her with older kids and she's very informative and doesn't mind getting on the floor and playing with the children. Excellent nanny
description.originalText: She watched my newborn till she was about one and a half and took very good care of her. Even giving medicine and informing us when she has a cough or rashes or anything. Excellent nanny

description.displayText: Angie, who was employed by me to care for 5 yr. old twins (boy and girl)for approximately one (1) month, is  intelligent, beautiful, gifted, and works well with children overall.  However, some improvement is needed with respect to reliability and her availability to work.  This most likely will be achieved with further work experience.  I wish her well and the twins will miss her.
